ProgramInitiative.name: ProgramInitiative
ProgramInitiative.description: Represents information about a sustainability initiative in a program.

ActualCost.description: The actual cost of the program initiative.

BusinessRegion.description: The business region where the initiative is running.

City.description: The city where the initiative is running.

Country.description: The country where the initiative is running.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency in which the cost was incurred.

EmissionsActivityId.description: The emissions activity impacted by the initiative.

EndDate.description: The date when the initiative ends.

EstimatedCost.description: The estimated cost of the program initiative.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the initiative is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the initiative.

StartDate.description: The date when the initiative begins.

Type.description: The type of initiative that is part of the program.
